Trustee_1.name: Hiroshi Tanaka
Trustee_1.content: Hiroshi Tanaka's reputation has further declined following the rejection of his allocation plan by investor Mohammed Al-Farsi, which stems from their mutual distrust reflected by possible connections to each other's blacklist. As a result, his acceptance rate continues to plummet, now reflecting even greater skepticism regarding his competence in fostering productive investor relationships. With consecutive failed attempts at securing agreements, Hiroshi's capability to instill investor confidence is now significantly jeopardized, raising concerns about his future as a trustee.
